benchmark_details.name: Game Reasoning Arena
benchmark_details.overview: The Game Reasoning Arena provides a framework for evaluating the decision-making abilities of language models through strategic board games, enabling systematic comparisons between language model agents and other types of agents in various game scenarios.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a structured and extensible platform for evaluating the strategic reasoning of large language models in game-playing scenarios.

data.source: Games implemented in Googleâ€™s OpenSpiel library

methodology.calculation: Metrics are derived from the trajectories of agent actions and reasoning strings over multiple simulation episodes.
methodology.interpretation: Higher cumulative rewards and decision optimality indicate better reasoning capability.
methodology.validation: Statistical significance is ensured by running multiple simulations and using paired-sample tests for performance comparison.
